MAIN_MESSAGE: We are currently experiencing problems with the electricity supply in your area.  Our engineers are now working on the fault and we hope to have your electricity restored by 12-JAN-2021 12:00.  Please accept our sincere apologies for the inconvenience this is causing.
TRANSCRIPT: There is a power cut in the LL57 postcode area of Bangor affecting properties in Britannia Street, Bron Bethel, Ffordd Llanllechid and surrounding area. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 05:54AM. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of difficulty locating the cause of the fault, and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by Midday today. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 07:40AM on 12th January 2021
